accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Collection is open to all researchers.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Before reproducing or quoting from any materials, in whole or in part, permission must be obtained from the Special Collections Research Center, and the holder of the copyright, if not Swem Library.

acqinfo.p: The materials were acquired by Special Collections Research Center on 04/21/2009.

processinfo.p: Accessioned and processed in May 2009 by Ute Schechter.

bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: Information about this individual or organization may be available in the Special Collections Research Center Wiki: http://scrc.swem.wm.edu/wiki/index.php/Angel of Mt. Shavano Post 3820 (Salida, Col.). Ladies Auxiliary.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Minute book, 1948-1959 of the Ladies Auxiliary to the Veterans of Foreign Wars of the United States. Angel of Mt. Shavano Post 3820 (Salida, Col.). Recorded are minutes for 1948-1950, and membership and officers for 1947-1950. Minutes are fairly detailed and give a good impression of the group's activities.

controlaccess.p: This Collection is indexed under the following controlled access subject terms.
